MS.S: PowerShell script that allow you to manage the upgrade process with winget. _x000A_It adds a few more options than 'winget upgrade --all':_x000A_- create a file with the packages you would like to omit;_x000A_- add or remove packages from the blacklist file directly from the script;_x000A_- automatically omit packages with "unknown" installed version, or when the formats of_x000A_ the installed version and the available version formats does not match;_x000A_- it tries to guess the correct installed version by reading the pattern _x000A_ from the available version;_x000A_- manually edit the upgrade queue;_x000A_- quick mode (it's similar to 'winget upgrade --all' but with a blacklist applied);_x000A_- wingetParam <string> option with custom parameters to pass to winget. '-h' is set by default;_x000A_- you can preselect one of the options available from the menu by adding the -option parameter_x000A_with A, C or S argument._x000A__x000A_Known issue with Windows Powershell ver. <= 5.1 (desktop):_x000A_Due to the ascii encoding, packages with longer names than 30 chars may corrupt _x000A_the 'winget upgrade' result, i.e. info about the long name package _x000A_and the packages listed after it. _x000A_Please use this script with PowerShell ver. > 5.1 (core) if you can _x000A_or avoid installing long name packages with winget.

- once a week, the script checks if there is a new version available on powershellgallery.com_x000A_and if so, the information is added to the table;_x000A_- the package's manifest file is downloaded if there is an update for it._x000A_Information about the release notes and the URL for them are retrieved from the manifest file_x000A_and can be presented to the user under the [ R ] option;_x000A_- manifests older than 3 months are deleted at the end of the script;_x000A_- additional files to the script are now placed in the folder;_x000A_- testing the Internet connection can be omitted with the omitNetTest parameter;_x000A_- reformating the table, separators and menu;_x000A_- better parameter validation, error handling and easier debugging;_x000A_- adjusted version recognition mechanism;_x000A_- the script can now play an idle animation while waiting for the user's response_x000A_( idleAnimation parameter ).

PowerShell script that allow you to manage the upgrade process with winget. _x000A_It adds a few more options than 'winget upgrade --all':_x000A_- create a file with the packages you would like to omit;_x000A_- add or remove packages from the blacklist file directly from the script;_x000A_- automatically omit packages with "unknown" installed version, or when the formats of_x000A_ the installed version and the available version formats does not match;_x000A_- it tries to guess the correct installed version by reading the pattern _x000A_ from the available version;_x000A_- manually edit the upgrade queue;_x000A_- quick mode (it's similar to 'winget upgrade --all' but with a blacklist applied);_x000A_- wingetParam <string> option with custom parameters to pass to winget. '-h' is set by default;_x000A_- you can preselect one of the options available from the menu by adding the -option parameter_x000A_with A, C or S argument._x000A__x000A_Known issue with Windows Powershell ver. <= 5.1 (desktop):_x000A_Due to the ascii encoding, packages with longer names than 30 chars may corrupt _x000A_the 'winget upgrade' result, i.e. info about the long name package _x000A_and the packages listed after it. _x000A_Please use this script with PowerShell ver. > 5.1 (core) if you can _x000A_or avoid installing long name packages with winget.

- once a week, the script checks if there is a new version available on powershellgallery.com_x000A_and if so, the information is added to the table;_x000A_- the package's manifest file is downloaded if there is an update for it._x000A_Information about the release notes and the URL for them are retrieved from the manifest file_x000A_and can be presented to the user under the [ R ] option;_x000A_- manifests older than 3 months are deleted at the end of the script;_x000A_- additional files to the script are now placed in the folder;_x000A_- testing the Internet connection can be omitted with the omitNetTest parameter;_x000A_- reformating the table, separators and menu;_x000A_- better parameter validation, error handling and easier debugging;_x000A_- adjusted version recognition mechanism;_x000A_- the script can now play an idle animation while waiting for the user's response_x000A_( idleAnimation parameter ).
